entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
